Text: Where do Dead Babies Go??  To Hell!  There are NO Exceptions in the Bible for those who do not except Jesus. No reading between the lines required.  On the other hand, if you believe (wrongly) that ALL Dead Babies go to "Heaven', then opposing abortion is contradictory.  If that unwanted baby grows up and turns against 'fundamental christianity' then your mission has failed.  Unless your a Satan helper.
